titles.title: A resolution designating the week of January 25 through January 31, 2015, as "National School Choice Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
1/20/2015--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the week of January 25-January 31, 2015, as National School Choice Week.
Congratulates the students, parents, teachers, and school leaders from K-12 education environments of all varieties for their persistence, achievements, dedication, and contributions to society in the United States.
Encourages all parents, during National School Choice Week, to learn more about the education options available to them.
